on reading compounds: 曝書【バクショ】airing of books
被曝【ヒバク】being exposed to radiation, radiation exposure
低線量被曝【テイセンリョウヒバク】low level radiation, low dose irradiation, low dose exposure
kun reading compounds: 晒す【さらす】to expose (to the sun, public, danger, etc.), to bleach, to refine, to rinse (vegetables), to soak, to doxx, to dox, to make someone's private information public without permission (esp. online), to sentence someone to public humiliation
